excerpt: If you're looking for the release date and time of Holland, here are all the details, including where to stream the drama thriller online.
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: The Holland release date and time are fast approaching and viewers are eager to learn the details. This film was directed by Mimi Cave, from a script penned by Andrew Sodroski. The story follows a teacher named Nancy, who lives in Holland, Michigan, with her husband. Her life takes an odd and unexpected turn when she and her colleague uncover a twisted secret related to her husband. So, here’s all you need to know about when and where you can watch the movie online. When is the Holland release date & time? The film’s release date is March 27, 2025, and its release time is 12 AM Pacific Time (PT) and 3:00 AM Eastern Time (ET). Check out its release times in the U.S. below: TimezoneRelease DateRelease TimeEastern TimeMarch 27, 202503:00 AMPacific TimeMarch 27, 202512:00 AM Nicole Kidman headlines the film, playing the main protagonist Nancy. Supporting cast members include Gael Garcia Bernal, Matthew Macfadyen, Rachel Sennott, Jude Hill, Lennon Parham, Jacob Moran, Jeff Pope, and Isaac Krasner. Where to watch Holland You can watch Holland via Amazon Prime Video. Owned by Amazon, Prime Video is a streaming service that offers subscribers a variety of film and television content, spanning genres and languages. Prime Video’s vast content library includes both original and licensed projects. Reacher, Invincible, Maxton Hall – The World Between Us, and The Terminal List are some of Prime Video’s prominent properties. To access Prime Video’s huge catalog of films, television shows, and documentaries you need an Amazon Prime Membership. Amazon offers a monthly membership plan for $14.99 and a yearly membership plan for $139. Meanwhile, students can avail a special plan costing just $7.49 per month. What is Holland about? The official synopsis for Holland is as follows: “Nancy is a teacher whose life with her husband in Holland, Michigan, tumbles into a twisted tale when she and her colleague become suspicious of a secret.”
html:
The Holland release date and time are fast approaching and viewers are eager to learn the details. This film was directed by Mimi Cave, from a script penned by Andrew Sodroski. The story follows a teacher named Nancy, who lives in Holland, Michigan, with her husband. Her life takes an odd and unexpected turn when she and her colleague uncover a twisted secret related to her husband.

So, here’s all you need to know about when and where you can watch the movie online.

When is the Holland release date & time?

The film’s release date is March 27, 2025, and its release time is 12 AM Pacific Time (PT) and 3:00 AM Eastern Time (ET).

Check out its release times in the U.S. below:

Nicole Kidman headlines the film, playing the main protagonist Nancy. Supporting cast members include Gael Garcia Bernal, Matthew Macfadyen, Rachel Sennott, Jude Hill, Lennon Parham, Jacob Moran, Jeff Pope, and Isaac Krasner.

Where to watch Holland

You can watch Holland via Amazon Prime Video.

Owned by Amazon, Prime Video is a streaming service that offers subscribers a variety of film and television content, spanning genres and languages. Prime Video’s vast content library includes both original and licensed projects. Reacher, Invincible, Maxton Hall – The World Between Us, and The Terminal List are some of Prime Video’s prominent properties.

To access Prime Video’s huge catalog of films, television shows, and documentaries you need an Amazon Prime Membership. Amazon offers a monthly membership plan for $14.99 and a yearly membership plan for $139. Meanwhile, students can avail a special plan costing just $7.49 per month.

What is Holland about?

The official synopsis for Holland is as follows:

“Nancy is a teacher whose life with her husband in Holland, Michigan, tumbles into a twisted tale when she and her colleague become suspicious of a secret.”
